title: 2017–18 French Guiana Régional 1
text:
The 2017–18 <a href="French%20Guiana%20R%C3%A9gional%201">French Guiana Régional 1</a> is the 57th season of the <a href="French%20Guiana%20R%C3%A9gional%201">French Guiana Régional 1</a>, the top tier of <a href="association%20football">football</a> in <a href="French%20Guiana">French Guiana</a>. The season began on 14 September 2017 and ended on 16 June 2018.
Standings.
Note: 4 points for a win, 2 points for a draw, 1 point for a defeat.
